meanings.definition: Separate into individual components or parts.
meanings.sent1: I will unbundled the toys to play with them separately.
meanings.sent2: She likes to unbundled the crayons before coloring.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to unbundled the colors of the rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to unbundled the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic carefully unbundled the engine to fix the issue.

meanings.definition: Remove from a bundle or package.
meanings.sent1: Please unbundled the flowers from the bouquet.
meanings.sent2: He had to unbundled the wires to fix the connection.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to unbundled the nuts from the package.
meanings.sent4: The sun slowly unbundled the fog from the valley.
meanings.sent5: She carefully unbundled the gift to see what was inside.
